survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Sustainable Packaging in E-Commerce Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather consumer preferences and satisfaction levels regarding sustainable packaging options in e-commerce deliveries.

questions.question_text: How important is sustainable packaging to you when making an online purchase?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure importance. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How important is sustainable packaging to you when making an online purchase?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable packaging materials do you prefer? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture a comprehensive view of material preferences.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainable packaging materials do you prefer? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current sustainable packaging options offered by e-commerce platforms?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction. Ensure the scale is clear and intuitive.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current sustainable packaging options offered by e-commerce platforms?

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay extra for sustainable packaging options?
answer_options: It depends on the price difference
questions.client_notes: Include a conditional follow-up question if respondents select 'It depends on the price difference'.

script.question_text: Would you be willing to pay extra for sustainable packaging options?
answer_options: It depends on the price difference

questions.question_text: What factors influence your preference for sustainable packaging? (Open-ended)
questions.routing_logic: Show to all respondents who selected 'Very important' or 'Somewhat important' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Allow respondents to elaborate on their preferences. Use a text box for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What factors influence your preference for sustainable packaging? (Open-ended)
script.routing_logic: Show to all respondents who selected 'Very important' or 'Somewhat important' in Q1
